Title: Movie Search
Description: Movies search is an easy application to use. Just search for amovie and in return you will get information about that movie such as actors, directors, plot etc.

Title: Local Wire
Description: Local Wire is an application for you to see the nearest local breweries, restaurants, and events. All you have to do is enter your city and you'll get your results However, just keep in mind if you want to see the events going on, you have to enter a start date and end date.

Title: Employee Directory
Description: Employee Directory was build using React. User can enter employees name in the search bar to shorten the list of employees.

Title: Password Generator
Description: User will be able to generate a password and have the option to choose between lowercase, uppercase, number, and symbol. Character length has to be a min of 8 characters and max of 128 characters.

Title: Weather Dashboard
Description: I built this application to let users check the weather in the state that they are in. They will be able to check the temperature, humidity, wind speed, and UV index for the current day & the next five day forecast.

Title: Code Quiz
Description: Code quiz is an application that will give you 50 seconds toanswer 5 coding question. But beware, for ever wrong question that you get wrong, you'll lose 6 seconds off the timer. Good luck and have fun ðŸ˜„  , When you finish enter your initals to keep track of your score.

Title: Note Taker
Description: Note Taker is an application that will let you add notes and also delete them. Don't worry about losing your notes for this application for it has data persistence
